overview: Equal parts kitsch & nostaglia, this two-part seasonal spectacular is one one-of-a-kindâ€”haunting, hysterical, and heart-warming all at the same time!!  A fantastic plethora of vintage Yuletide television insanity featuring ABBOTT & COSTELLO, RONALD REAGAN, ROSEMARY CLOONEY, ERNIE KOVACS, BOB CUMMINGS, LIBERACE, JACK BENNY, EDGAR BERGEN & CHARLIE McCARTHY, PAUL WNCHELL & JERRY MAHONEY, RICKY NELSON, OZZIE & HARRIET and BOB HOPE!
title: Christmas in Acidland Part 1
